heroDescription: Hi, I'm Omar, a developer based in the United States with ideas and code.

hushbot.title: Hush Bot, Your Ultimate Discord Companion for Fun, Moderation, and Community Engagement!
hushbot.desc: Hush Bot is a versatile Discord bot designed to enhance community engagement and moderation on servers. It features a variety of commands.

chat.title: Discord clone that is fully functional for educational purposes only!
